title: Why does it say i am still lvl 1
body:
I am currently lvl 5, but it says that i am only lvl 1. Can anybody tell me what's the matter
{{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}
and apparently i am suppose to get 400rp when i reach lvl 3?
is it just me or am i just unlucky?

replies.body:
Hey there,

Are you talking about your boards profile? Sometimes that doesn't update until you make a post (It seems to have updated to reflect the correct level now)

Also the RP reward was removed with the introduction of Hextech Crafting, now new players should receive a Starter Chest upon hitting level 3(?)
